person.persName: J. Byron Montgomery (Louisville, KY, clerk and 1st lieutenant (CSA))

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, clerk and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Jeptha D. Montgomery and Arabella Barrett Montgomery. Student in Franklin County in 1850. Clerk in Franklin County in 1860. Printer in Franklin County in 1863. Served in the 3rd Kentucky Cavalry (C.S.A.) as a 2nd lieutenant and 1st lieutenant from November 1, 1862, to February 28, 1863. Served in Grigsby’s Cavalry, Tennessee, as ordinance officer and 1st lieutenant from March 15, 1864 to June 16, 1864. Paroled May 1865.
